proposal: Hey Flywheel community, congrats on reaching 19 holders in the ETH network! Your project is like a well-oiled machine, turning volatility and arbitrage into yield. We've got some tools that could help you keep that flywheel spinning. Ever thought about deploying your own DEX or adding a lottery feature? It's all B2B, so you're not just earning PEAS, you're growing the whole pod. Let's chat!
